alert.note: Alert for Hancock; McDonough (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 03 at 8:03AM CST until January 03 at 10:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Iowa, Van Buren and Lee Counties. In Illinois, Hancock and McDonough Counties. In Missouri, Scotland and Clark Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect sudden reductions in visibility. Reduced visibility will make travel conditions hazardous for the morning commute.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
